game_description: Experience Retro Arcade Basketball Action with VR Ballcade! 210 Arcade levels to challenge your reflexes and endless Freeplay mode to practice your shots! Customize your balls in thousands of different ways by unlocking new patterns and texture combinations! Use the practice court to hone your skill at various basket heights. Play H.O.R.S.E. or go Head to Head with a friend via local WiFi! Players: 1-2 Modes: Arcade, Freeplay, Hard Mode! Practice court Arcade levels: 210 Freeplay modes: Timed( 30, 60, 90, 120 seconds), Infinite Hard Mode: Smaller basket, backboard has more bounce!
review_1: The shooting was weird at first, but after a few rounds I started to get the hang of it (release timing?). I like the hand eye coordination challenge this game presents and that the levels are hard without being impossible. Would be cool to see public multiplayer matches in the future instead of just direct connect.
review_2: Except for Blacktop Hoops, all basketball shooting games in the AppLab — including this one — suffer from a poorly executed shooting mechanism that is far from realistic. This game is more frustrating than it is fun. Definitely not worth $15.
